welcome.title: FileCatalyst Direct
welcome.action: What do you want to do today?
welcome.description: This web application includes interfaces for uploading or downloading to FileCatalyst Server and also for creating a web link to distribute files to anyone with an email address.
welcome.userOptions: To get started, choose from the options below:

form.emailHint: use a semicolon to separate email addresses
form.subject: Subject

createLink.noPermission: The logged user doesn't have reading permission. Weblink creation denied.
createLink.failPermissions: Unable to verify user's permissions. Please reload the page. If the problem persists contact your network admin.

link.title: FileCatalyst WebLink
link.failWeblink: The Weblink could not be sent. Please check FC TransferAgent logs
link.emptyWeblink: The server returned an empty list of file.
link.missedFileMotive: __count__ file missed. It was deleted or moved from server.
link.missedFileMotive_plural: __count__ files missed. They were deleted or moved from server.

webDeployment.helpEmail: semicolon-delimited address(es) to notify upon transfer completion
webDeployment.transferQueueMultiplesExistMessage: Duplicates were selected for adding to the queue; only the non-duplicates have been added.
webDeployment.directoriesNotAllowedMessage: is a directory and may not be added to the queue
webDeployment.existingQueueFailureMessage: The existing queue does not meet filtering requirements
webDeployment.maxFilesExceededMessage: Maximum number of files for the queue is
webDeployment.fileSizeMaxExceededMessage: You cannot add a file larger than the maximum size of (in bytes):
webDeployment.fileSizeMinUnmetMessage: You cannot add a file smaller than the minimum size of (in bytes):
webDeployment.filenameRegexFailMessage: One or more file or folder names does not match a "regular expression" set by the administrator.
webDeployment.fileSizeTotalExceededMessage: Adding these files will exceed the maximum queue size of:
webDeployment.fileTransferError: There was an error with one or more file transfers. Please consult your FileCatalyst TransferAgent logs for specific details.
webDeployment.findLogsMessage: Errors are itemized in your FileCatalyst TransferAgent logs. If you are not sure where to find the logs, open the Configuration page launched via the tray icon menu.
webDeployment.lostConnectionFatal: The FileCatalyst TransferAgent seems to have been shut down or otherwise become unavailable. You must refresh this page and build your queue from scratch; if your administrator has enabled auto-resume, the files should begin from where they left off.
webDeployment.agentNotFoundMsg: The FileCatalyst TransferAgent application could not be detected.
webDeployment.agentNotFoundDownloadMsg: You may download the application by clicking the action button below. You must confirm installation of the application to continue.
webDeployment.agentNotFoundCancel: The installation of the FileCatalyst TransferAgent application could not be detected or confirmed. FileCatalyst-based transfers are disabled on this page.
webDeployment.downloadButtonNoFiles: No files have been associated with the download button. Please contact the administrator of this website to report the issue.
webDeployment.portNotFoundMsg: A connection port could not be found. If the FileCatalyst TransferAgent is currently running, you may either Retry auto-detection or manually configure the port in the provided field below.
webDeployment.portNotFoundCancel: A usable port was not identified or configured. FileCatalyst-based transfers are disabled on this page.
webDeployment.errorRemoteNotConfiguredMsg: The administrator of this site has not provided at least one FileCatalyst Server hostname; no transfers are possible and the FileCatalyst TransferAgent interface shall not be visible.
webDeployment.errorConnectingMsg: The web application was not able to establish a connection to the FileCatalyst TransferAgent. Please ensure that it is installed and running, then refresh this page.
webDeployment.errorConnectingRemoteMsg: A connection could not be established to one or more remote FileCatalyst Servers. Since no transfer is possible, the UI has been disabled. To retry later, simply refresh this page. If the problem persists, contact the organization managing this web application.
webDeployment.errorNotLicensedMsg: The remote FileCatalyst Server is not licensed for a TransferAgent connection. Since no transfer is possible, the UI has been disabled. To retry later, simply refresh this page. If you continue to see this message, contact the site administrator.
webDeployment.errorServerExpiredMsg: The remote FileCatalyst Server has an expired license. Since no transfer is possible, the UI has been disabled. To retry later, simply refresh this page. If you continue to see this message, contact the site administrator.
webDeployment.supplyCredentialsMsg: Please supply the requested credentials in order to connect to this server:
webDeployment.checkCredentialsMsg: There has been a problem connecting to this FileCatalyst Server. Please check and re-enter your credentials to try again. If you continue to see this message, contact the site administrator.
webDeployment.manualConfigCancel: Configuration of the FileCatalyst TransferAgent is not complete. To attempt configuration again, refresh the page.
webDeployment.errorAgentAbsent: The FileCatalyst TransferAgent seems to have become unavailable. Once TransferAgent is back online, you may continue browsing. If a file transfer was underway, it will be lost and you are required to restart.
webDeployment.manualConfigMsg: A connection to the FileCatalyst TransferAgent application could not be established. Please follow the instructions below to continue:
webDeployment.manualConfigInstallRequired: You must check the box to confirm that the FileCatalyst TransferAgent application is installed.
webDeployment.manualConfigInstructionLaunch: Confirm installation with the checkbox below, then launch the application:
webDeployment.manualConfigInstructionPort: Identify the port FileCatalyst TransferAgent is listening on via the tray icon, and enter in the text field below.
webDeployment.manualConfigInstructionDone: Press the "Confirm" button to confirm manual configuration and refresh this page.
webDeployment.manualLaunchMsg: This page uses FileCatalyst TransferAgent. Click "Launch" to launch the application. If TransferAgent does not launch, please {tryAgain} or {download}.
webDeployment.manualLaunchRememberLabel: Remember to launch automatically next time.
webDeployment.heartbeatStatusZeroMsg: Note: if TransferAgent is already running and you are seeing this message, please download and install the latest version.
webDeployment.downloadNotify: After FileCatalyst TransferAgent has finished downloading, open the installer and follow the instructions. Once install is complete, click the "Launch" button on this page.
webDeployment.upgradeNotify: After downloading and installing a new version of TransferAgent, please refresh this page.
webDeployment.ieReloadPage: If using IE, please refresh the page (F5) to connect to TransferAgent
webDeployment.queueNoFiles: No files in the queue to transfer
webDeployment.queueNoClear: No files to clear from the queue
webDeployment.retryDialogMsg: This dialog did not complete successfully or was not closed; please try again.
webDeployment.internetExplorerConfig:
Internet Explorer requires manual configuration in order to use the FileCatalyst TransferAgent:

  1. Open “Internet Options”
  2. Select “Security” tab
  3. Select “Trusted sites” zone
  4. Click “Sites”
  5. If correct site is pre-populated, click “Add” then “Close”; otherwise manually enter appropriate site first.

This must be done with each unique site that uses TransferAgent.
webDeployment.upgradeJSisNewer: A newer version of the FileCatalyst TransferAgent is available. Please select the appropriate action below to continue. After downloading and installing a new version of TransferAgent, please refresh this page.
webDeployment.doNotShowAgainCheckbox: Do not show this dialog again
webDeployment.errorsListMessage: The following errors have been logged:
webDeployment.warningOnNavigate: If you close or leave this page before the transfer has completed, the application will not function as intended
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailed: The attempt to launch the TransferAgent application has timed out. This can happen if trying to:
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailedReason1: Launch when the application is not downloaded and installed;
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailedReason2: Launch is selected but permissions are refused;
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailedReason3: Launch is selected but there is a problem with the configured port
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailedReason4: The application simply fails to start
webDeployment.warningLaunchFailedReason5: TransferAgent is already running but is an old version with an expired certificate

tooltips.removeCredentialsWarning: Remove saved credentials from this computer?
